did.unittitle: Richard Henry Dana Jr.to George Palmer Putnam

scopecontent.p: [Re inclusion of Richard Henry Dana Sr.'s home in book on homes of American authors; has selected Hammatt Billingsas the artist.]

did.unittitle: Richard Henry Dana Jr.to George Palmer Putnam

scopecontent.p: [Declines to write sketch on his father for Putnam's book but suggests material on Dana Sr. in [Rufus] Griswold's Poets of Americaor Livingston's Law Magazineand recommends that George Wilbur Peckwrite the piece; suggests picture caption.]

did.unittitle: George Wilbur Peckto George Palmer Putnam

scopecontent.p: [Concerns article on Richard Henry Dana Sr.for Putnam's book; wants Dana Jr. to check it.]

did.unittitle: Richard Henry Dana Jr.to George Palmer Putnam

scopecontent.p: [Expresses pleasure with George Wilbur Peck's sketch on Dana Sr. for Putnam's book; relays Dana Sr.'s request for a price for copies of illustrations of the Dana home.]

did.unittitle: George Wilbur Peckto George Palmer Putnam

scopecontent.p: [Re proofs for his Richard Henry Dana Sr.article for Putnam's book.]

did.unittitle: Richard Henry Dana Sr.to George Palmer Putnam

scopecontent.p: [Re his biographical sketch in Putnam's book.]

did.unittitle: Richard Henry Dana Jr.to George Palmer Putnam

scopecontent.p: [Re proofs of George Wilbur Peck's article on his father; mentions Dana Sr.'s desire to purchase copies of the picture of his house.]
